duties_responsibilities.duty: Architect and develop RTL for various products with a focus on Digital Controls, Encryption, and Authentication.
Work with global team members in designing building blocks and entire new products.
Experience in high-speed and low-power digital design in advanced deep sub-micron processes.
Proficient in SystemVerilog/Verilog RTL, Design Compiler, PrimeTime, and programming/scripting languages.
Good communication skills and ability to take ownership of tasks.
Experience in embedded micro-controllers, encryption, authentication, and management protocol circuits.
Experience in digital control circuits for PMICs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
